name: Labyrinth 3 for Tobii Eyetracking
description:
Note: This game requires a Tobii Eyetracker to play!

Labyrinth 3 for Tobii Eyetracking is a 3D labyrinth experience initially developed for people with disabilities. If you own a Tobii Eyetracking device (Tobii Eye Tracker 4C) you can control the game only using your eyes, no other input method needed.

Dynavox Eyetrackers currentl are not supported.
